features.title: Unlimited Entries
features.description: Write as much and as often as you like without any limitations. Capture every moment, thought, and idea for free.

features.title: Tagging & Search
features.description: Easily organize and find your entries using tags and powerful search functionality.

features.title: Encryption & Privacy
features.description: Your entries are securely encrypted, keeping your private thoughts and memories safe from prying eyes.

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
features.description: Enjoy a sleek, intuitive design that makes journaling simple and enjoyable.
